page.discussion: Get the array age semaphore, which reflects the number of changes made to the array since its creation.
page.example:
dim arrc[0] as c arrc[arrc.append()] = "fred"
? arrc.age() = 1
arrc[arrc.append()] = "joe" ? arrc.age() = 2
? arrc.dump() = fred joe
page.note: For property arrays, you must call [<ARRAY>.TOUCH()] to update the array's age semaphore.
